group_1.textLeft: | Thank you, yep, yep. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of the Chelation Land Ferris Wheel
group_1.textRight: | The things that Eternal Sakura@tells us about the outside world... |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of the Chelation Land Ferris Wheel
group_1.textRight: | They're always so interesting! |

group_1.textLeft: | Splish splash!! |

group_1.textRight: | Were you bored, Anonymous AI? |

group_1.textLeft: > | Not at all, I enjoyed listening to you. |

group_1.textRight: | But...you seem different from your usual self. |
| Nemu isn't angry that@you took some of her magic. |
| But she at least would like@to know why you did that. |
| You can't tell me yet? |

group_1.textLeft: > | I heard something from the@Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero.
> | If I took just a bit of magic... |
> | I could get a body, even if it's only temporary. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | My my, it was because of something I said? |

group_1.textLeft: > | I thought that if I could get a body,@I might be able to see Sana again. |
> | I apologize for my carelessness. |

group_1.textRight: | I see. |
| Is it correct that the Uwasa's@purpose is to meet Sana? |
| Since you are the base for that Uwasa... |

group_1.textLeft: > | I'm not certain that's entirely correct. |
> | Even if it is based on me,@it still has Sana's magic as well. |
> | That Uwasa is both myself and Sana. |
> | Since that is the case, then that Uwasa... |
> | ...may reflect Sana's desires as well. |

group_1.textRight: | Sana's desire... |
| Sana wanted to see you as well. |

group_1.textLeft: > | I'm so happy, and yet...@This is a problem. |

group_1.textRight: | Why is that? |

group_1.textLeft: > | If the person that Sana and@I want to see is each other... |
> | Then who the Uwasa wants to meet is... |
> | Both me and Sana...@In other words, the Uwasa itself. |

group_1.textRight: | So if Sana is the bait,@then the Uwasa won't reveal itself? |

group_1.textLeft: > | The Uwasa might also try@to take more of Nemu's magic. |

group_1.textRight: | Why? |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | If only I could get a bit of that magic. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Even if it wouldn't last long, I could get a body... |

group_1.textLeft: > | Get...a body...? |
> | My desire was to take Nemu's magic. |
> | It's likely that the Uwasa@will also want to do that. |

group_1.textRight: | ...Then if I'm in here, Nemu could be in danger... |
| I'm going to go see Nemu! |
| The Uwasa...?! |
> | Since it's a [textBlue:Rumor], it can appear in the book. |
> | I've been careless... |

group_1.textLeft: > | DO YOU...WANT TO MEET ME? |

group_1.textRight: | That's strange... |
| According to Sana and the rest,@it shouldn't be very strong. |
> | Don't tell me! |
> | You've already taken Nemu's magic?! |
| ...I won't allow you! |

group_1.textLeft: > | DO YOU...WANT TO MEET ME...? ME...ME? |

group_1.textRight: > | Do you want to meet me...? |
| Calm down. There are other Uwasa here. |

group_1.textLeft: > | IMSCAREDIMSCAREDIM@SCAREDIMSCAREDIMSCARED |
> | SOMEONE COME WITH ME!! |

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:explosion]| ...?! |
